backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries detailing required updates to YesTapSequence and related assets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry bootstrap that loads the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app orchestrating password gating, proposal UI, evasive No button, and YesTapSequence display.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Password entry flow with animated welcome screen and validation against a fixed code.
frontend/src/components/RomanticSceneLay: Layout wrapper adding layered gradients and animated floating hearts around page content.
frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.t: Threeâ€‘step looping tap sequence with image preloading and keyboard accessibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Provides a hook to position and reposition the No button randomly on hover or touch, keeping it far from the previous location.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for a romantic-themed light/dark UI with background and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors tied to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project-wide metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine proposal app.
